title: Hacked and rito cares?
body: was hacked on an acct that's shit but has a lot. I cant log into the site, nothing in my emails about any of it. ive sent logs discussing the issue, and made a post about this on a new acct but its gone now... >.> If I cant get any help i'm suppose to just assume all that I put on that account is gone? Since most likely he (she) was able to change my shit before me ([possibly) even though I changed password and email and VERIFIED them??? Still cant any access to client or web site, most of all its been over 5 hours and ive received nothing of this matter. Guess the customer isn't always right...gg..wp

replies.body: We want to help, but you have to make sure it's going to the correct venue.  Account recovery requires knowledge of personal information that makes it difficult to resolve over the boards.  You'll want to fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) for our account recovery team to look who, specifically tasked with assisting in cases like this.  Fill that out asap, and we'll help with recovery as well as any repairs as soon as we can.  We got your back!

I have used that exact link and gave info the best I could. I originally sent it from Khan Solo and afterwards ive been locked out off here (web site) and client from that account. (TY btw its been along few weeks)
